Key Match Events: Julius Randle played solid defense on New Orleans' Zion Williamson
Randle had 16 points, 6 rebounds, 3 assists, and 2 steals, going +21 during his 35 minutes
Post-Match Reflections: Chris Finch said he's conscious that the Wolves are asking Randle to do a lot of different things
Finch noted that he has a lot of respect for how Randle has handled the different things the Wolves have asked him to do this season
Miscellaneous Highlights: Randle's performance is one of the more interesting storylines for this Wolves team as the season approaches the halfway point
Others: The Wolves have asked Randle to do different things at different times as their team's ebbed and flowed
Randle's fit with Rudy Gobert and Jaden McDaniels in the starting lineup has been questionable at best
